abstract: The estimated sale price of one cover, showing the Penguin fleeing Batman and Robin, is $300,000.
snippet: The estimated sale price of one cover, showing the Penguin fleeing Batman and Robin, is $300,000.
lead_paragraph: Next month, Heritage Auctions will put on the block several pieces of Batman memorabilia that will entice fans with deep pockets. Collectors who are interested in original art will have their eye on three vintage covers from the collection of Jerry Robinson, the comic book artist who created the Joker.

headline.main: Holy (Cash) Cow! Vintage Comics Covers From Joker Creator Up for Auction
